com.inmobi.monetization
Interface IMBannerListener

public interface IMBannerListener

The Listener interface for receiving notifications from IMBanner about the ad status

Method Summary
 void onBannerInteraction(IMBanner banner, Map<String,String> params)
          Called when the banner is tapped or interacted with by the user.
Optional data is available to publishers to act on when using monetization platform to render promotional ads
 void onBannerRequestFailed(IMBanner banner, IMErrorCode errorCode)
          Called from IMBanner when this view has failed to load an ad.
 void onBannerRequestSucceeded(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when this view successfully loaded an ad.
 void onDismissBannerScreen(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when the ad comes back to its original position because of actions such as the user closing the expanded ad.
 void onLeaveApplication(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when the click on the ad leaves the application context.
 void onShowBannerScreen(IMBanner banner)
          Called from IMBanner when the ad expands on top of the screen because of an user action.
 

Method Detail

onBannerRequestFailed

void onBannerRequestFailed(IMBanner banner,
                           IMErrorCode errorCode)
Called from IMBanner when this view has failed to load an ad.

Parameters:
banner -
errorCode - errorCode.toString provides more information.

onBannerRequestSucceeded

void onBannerRequestSucceeded(IMBanner banner)
Called from IMBanner when this view successfully loaded an ad.

Parameters:
banner -

onBannerInteraction

void onBannerInteraction(IMBanner banner,
                         Map<String,String> params)
Called when the banner is tapped or interacted with by the user.
Optional data is available to publishers to act on when using monetization platform to render promotional ads

Parameters:
banner -
params -

onShowBannerScreen

void onShowBannerScreen(IMBanner banner)
Called from IMBanner when the ad expands on top of the screen because of an user action. The application has to suspend itself on receiving this notification.

Parameters:
banner -

onDismissBannerScreen

void onDismissBannerScreen(IMBanner banner)
Called from IMBanner when the ad comes back to its original position because of actions such as the user closing the expanded ad. The application has to resume itself on receiving this notification.

Parameters:
banner -

onLeaveApplication

void onLeaveApplication(IMBanner banner)
Called from IMBanner when the click on the ad leaves the application context. General use cases are CTAs such as call, SMS, Market, and so on.

Parameters:
banner -
